question: My husband is 58 years old, hep c, cirrhosis, diabetes mellitus:   3 weeks post cholescystecomy by Lap.  No problems about 1 week ago when he started experiencing abdominal pain waking up at night.  We thought it was food related so we eliminated lots of food.  No when he eats he is having lots of abdominal pain for hours which keeps him up at night.  He does have overall burning in stomach with minimal bouts of diarrhea.  He was admitted to the hospital CAT scan showed nothing or at least from a surgical perspective.  No GI has scheduled an endoscopy tomorrow.  Any thoughts?  Ulcer? diverticulitis?
title: abdominal pain
